alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:01AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 845 AM EDT/745 AM CDT/... At 801 AM EDT/701 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Ebro, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Seminole Hills, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Bruce, Red Head, Pine Log, Edgewater Gulf Beach, Sunnyside, Bunker, Laird, Laguna Beach, Hollywood Beach and Bid-a-Wee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
